colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,(CES GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG CHEN PO RJE BTZUN MI TRA BA'I BZHENG SROL 'JAM DBYANGS AA RA PA TZA NA LHA LNGA'I SGRUB THABS KUN GSAL SHES RAB MCHOG SBYIN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI THO YON DAR RGYAS KYIS DBANG PHYOGS RI BO RTZE LNGA 'DI RJE BTZUN 'JAM DBYANGS KYIS BYIN GYIS BRLABS PA'I GNAS CHEN KHYAD PAR CAN YIN GSHIS GNAS DE DANG, DE'I NYE SKOR DU 'KHOR BA'I RIGS KYIS NYAMS LEN BYAS CHOG PA'I RJE BTZUN 'JAM DPAL DBYANGS KYI SGRUB THABS DKYIL CHOG SOGS CHA CHANG BA ZHIG BYUNG NA 'BREL CHEB 'DUG CES RGYA NANG PHYOGS KYI BLA MA GRVA RIGS DU MA NAS KYANG ZER BA BCAS DGOS ZHES DON GNYER CHEN POS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, MNGON RTOGS KYI RIM PAR PHYE BA 'DI BZHIN GRUB CHEN RANG NYID KYIS MDZAD PAR GRAGS PA'I MU TIG 'PHRENG BA DANG, SNGAGS 'CHANG 'JAM DBYANGS PA'I MNGON DKYIL LA GZHI BYAS, SNGAGS RIM CHEN MO DANG, RIGS GSUM GYI CHO GA 'DUL 'DZIN RIN PO CHES MDZAD PA SGRUB THABS BRGYA RGYAM SOGS RIGS MTHUN DU MA NAS KHA 'GENG 'OS KYIS BRGYAN NAS, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG CHOS SMRA BA BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS RNG BYUNG 'PHAGS PA'I GZHAL MED KHANG PO TA LAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DAR HAN DGE SLONG BSKAL BZANG YON TAN GYIS BGYIS PA DZA YANTU, ,)
